skillTree.localised_description: The most impressive Nightmares are those reared on fresh blood. Such noble monstrosities are worthy mounts.

effects.description:
Passive Ability: " No Escape From Death", while this Mount is equipped, for Cavalry units
	(all units in army)

Passive Ability: "No Escape From Death" for Cavalry units
	(all units in army)

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: "To me, my winged steed of bone and flesh; let us fly and remake the world together!"

skillTree.localised_description: It is to the Plain of Bones that a Vampire Lord travels to claim a Zombie Dragon as their mount.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can fly.

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.
This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.
A dark pact has been made with darker Gods to guarantee victory.
Just like their monstrous namesake, the Order of the Dragon are formidable adversaries for any foe.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -35% for Blood Knight units
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -35% for Blood Knight units
	(Lord's army)

Local Recruitment duration: 0 turn for Blood Knights units (minimum 1)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A knight and his horse share a very strong bond  so strong that sometimes it can continue even after death.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -50% for Binding Circle chain buildings
	(local region)

Construction time: -1 for Binding Circle chain buildings
	(local region)

Upkeep: -50% for Black Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Local Recruitment duration: -1 turn for Black Knights (Lances & Barding) units (minimum 1)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A true knight will never abandon his armour; sometimes the steel skin appears to be part of his body.
Using a combination of their great strength and amazing speed, its easy for a Vampire to create a gap in their opponents guard.
Brought back from death to guard their Unliving masters.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -35% for Grave Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -35% for Grave Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Local Recruitment duration: 0 turn for Grave Guard units (minimum 1)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The first master of the Blood Dragons still walks among their ranks, and sees all that is done in his name.
Many mortal champions change their attitude when their proud challenge is accepted by a dark creature whose very eyes are the eyes of death
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
"See my coat of crimson armour? It is strengthened by thine blood and fear."
"Look into mine eyes, mortal; what glories do you see?"
The sword-strikes of mortal man are but clumsy, childish lunges before the preternatural speed of a Vampire.
Strike hard, strike true.
The strength of this Vampire to endure the centuries is beyond compare.
To look upon this Undead Lord is to witness true and absolute horror!

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.localised_description: "I am mighty, none dare challenge me!"

skillTree.localised_description: "Arise my host, my Unliving minions - bring me victory!"

skillTree.localised_description: The power of death cannot be denied.

skillTree.localised_description: A Lord of Necromancy's minions do not suffer exhaustion, they can walk for leagues and never suffer.
Once slain in battle, the foe belongs to the Undead Lord, and will rise again, eager to serve.

effects.description:
The Dead Rise Again: +5% hit points for destroyed Undead units restored after battle
	(Lord's army)

The Dead Rise Again: +10% hit points for destroyed Undead units restored after battle
	(Lord's army)

The Dead Rise Again: +15% hit points for destroyed Undead units restored after battle
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A powerful, vigorous Lord of Darkness will see the Children of the Night gather unto them.

	(Heroes in Lord's army)

	(Heroes in Lord's army)

Character experience gain: +30%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The sun is no ally of the dead - a sky scorched black, or darkest night, will invigorate the Unliving.

	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.
Such a beast is all but impossible to destroy - an immortal horror doomed to haunt eternity!

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A simple glamour can disguise a monstrous Vampire or Liche, so they may then charm and beguile the local populace.
W'soran's scions are masters at the art of Necromancy, to dabble in such will be a boon.
This Lord has endless forbearance, a timeless patience crafted over millennia.

	(armies in local owned region)

	(armies in local owned region)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord can hear the thoughts of mortals for leagues around, and plan accordingly.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Glory in your dark majesty, my lord."
Vampires and their liche-servants are devious creatures; manipulative with many mortal servants in their thrall.

effects.description:
Hero action cost: -10%
	(Heroes in local province)

Hero action success chance: +5%
	(Heroes in local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "They will tremble, my lord, oh, they will fear!"

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Once forbidden knowledge is acquired, Necromancers and Vampires will jealously guard it from rivals' eyes.

	(own army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A master indeed - to rival the Great Necromancer himself?

effects.description:

	(local region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.
Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached
Not on or below a platform
